channel.title: CVE Feed for BlackBerry -- Workspaces Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BlackBerry -- Workspaces Server

item.title: CVE-2017-9367|2024-09-16T16:24:17.407Z -- blackberry -- workspaces%20server
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability in the BlackBerry Workspaces Server could potentially allow an attacker to execute or upload arbitrary files, or reveal the content of arbitrary files anywhere on the web server by crafting a URL with a manipulated POST request.
